articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: China's third plenum kicks off as GDP disappoints: 5 things to know - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: All eyes on how Communist Party plans to steer economy through headwinds
articles.content:
SHANGHAI -- China's top Communist Party officials are gathering in Beijing for a meeting known as the third plenum, from Monday to Thursday.
The event comes at a crucial moment for the Chinese econo… [+280 chars]
